<@U071YF9HQF3>

The approach is “so simple” that all you have to do is do a loop through featured posts e.g. in the blog-list.html template and check if loop.index is equal to or below 2 (or any number you want).

Then below that you can run another (identical) loop of blog posts that checks if loop.index is equal to or above 3, to avoid getting the first two posts repeated in the loop below the two featured posts.

If you have no experience with HubL coding, sure it won’t be easy, but if you know a little hubl, it’s not that complicated

I was definitely trying to do something more complicated than that, but I did eventually come to that realization. I think I should be able to get it, but I have to take a break on this to work on a different project.
